oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A note on cancellation of projective modules
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DHORAJIA, AM
KESHARI, MK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ELEMENTARY ACTION
UNIMODULAR ROWS
MONOID RING
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove the following results. (i) Let A be an affine algebra of dimension d >= 4 over (F) over bar (p) (with p >= d). Then all projective A-modules of rank d - 1 are cancellative. (ii) Let A be a ring of dimension d such that Ed+1(R) acts transitively on Um(d+1)(R) for every finite extension R of A. Then for any projective A-module P of rank d, E(A circle plus P) acts transitively on Um(A circle plus P). (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PURE AND APPLIED ALGEBRA, 216(1)126-129
